subject: Ice Skating
lead_paragraph: The United States pairs champions Brooke Castile and Ben Okolski withdrew from Skate America because of Castile’s foot injury. Last year, Castile and Okolski made a huge jump, going from eighth at nationals to the title.
snippet: The United States pairs champions Brooke Castile and Ben Okolski withdrew from Skate America because of Castile’s foot injury. Last year, Castile and Okolski made a huge jump, going from eighth at nationals to the title.
